name: packing-webgl
description: Simple implementation of a packing algorithm, running on CPU.

scripts.pre-commit: npm run rebuild && npm run lint
scripts.build: npm run build-page && npm run webpack
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Jérémie PIELLARD <jeremie.piellard@gmail.com> (https://github.com/piellardj)
